summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 NISSAN MURANO. HE NOTICED POWER STEERING FLUID LEAKING OUT OF THE FLUIDS' CONTAINER. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER, IN WHICH HE WAS INFORMED THAT THE POWER STEERING HOSE NEEDED TO BE REPLACED; HOWEVER, THE PART WAS ON BACK ORDER. THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGES WERE 45,137.       UPDATED 11/3/09 *CN  THE CONSUMER WAITED OVER 6 WEEKS FOR A REPLACEMENT. UPDATED 11/05/09 *JB
